forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 61. Southwest wind 7 to 13 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 6 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this morning, a gentle awakening greets the city with partly sunny skies promising a touch of warmth, although the chill of oceanic winds lingers nearby. Rising cautiously just above the 60-degree mark, the day invites you to step outside, perhaps with a light jacket to buffer against the southwest breeze that flutters softly through the streets. As we look towards the iconic Golden Gate Bridge, the brightness of the sky contrasts sharply with the mist that curls around the edges of the bay—an ever-present reminder of this city's delicate dance between sun and fog. 

As day unfolds into evening, the clouds will take a more assertive role, dimming the vibrant tones of the afternoon and cooling the air to a tranquil 52 degrees. Perfect weather for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, where one might linger over a cup of coffee, watching the boats glide through the bay, or find a cozy nook in a local café. Layers will be your ally—comfortable, smart clothing that transitions seamlessly from day to night. With the charm of an urban landscape and the allure of the sea, San Francisco today encourages exploration at every corner, leaving one to savor the simple joys of a city teeming with life.
